CVE.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 6u71, 7u51, and 8, and Java SE Embedded 7u51, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Hotspot.

IAVM.title: Multiple Vulnerabilities in Oracle Java SE

vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN
